name: Mega Man Zero Online
description:
Megaman Zero Online is a multiplayer Mega Man Zero fangame in active development by Warrior555MainsGanon. It allows for multiple players to fight each other online as characters from the Mega Man Zero games.

The game is currently still in development, please join the official Discord server at https://discord.gg/X2ctJHypam for support, matchmaking and more!

(Not affiliated with Capcom and/or Inti Creates in any way. All credit goes to Capcom and Inti Creates for resources and IP used in the project.)

(Note: The screenshots on the right aren't from the current game. They are mockups of what the final game could look like.)
